resources.string: Sorry! Your device doesn\'t support speech input

Voice commands can be spoken in any order:


 1. ( + ) - "Plus"
 2. ( - ) - "Minus"
 3. ( / ) - "Divided by"
 4. ( x ) - "Times"
 5. ( ^ ) - "To the power of"
 6. ( . ) - "Point"
 7. ( , ) - "Comma"
 8. ( ? ) - "Question mark"
 9. ( ! ) - "Exclamation point"
 10. ( = ) - "Equals to"
 11. ( @ ) - "At the rate"
 12. ( / ) - "Forward slash"
 13. ( \ ) - "Backslash"
 14. ( % ) - "Percent"
 15. ( & ) - "Ampersand"
 16. ( * ) - "Asterisk"
 17. ( â€˜ ) - "Apostrophe"
 18. ( : ) - "Colon"
 19. ( [ ) - "Open bracket"
 20. ( ] ) - "Close bracket"
 21. ( ( ) - "Open parenthesis"
 22. ( ) ) - "Close parenthesis"
 23. :-( - "Sad face"
 24. :-) - "Smiley face"
